title: [Caligos Isle, Upper Berm]
description: Long and sloping, the berm running along the basalt cliffs is lit with random torches warning of holes from digging along the more remote sand of the upper beach.

Long and sloping, the berm running along the basalt cliffs shows some signs of digging, more remote from the more popular and softer sand of the lower beach.  Small white-bodied terns with frilled black head caps skitter here and there, searching for their next meal.
